thread.title: Toledo Police Department to hold motor vehicle auction
thread.title_full: Toledo Police Department to hold motor vehicle auction

author: 13abc
title: Toledo Police Department to hold motor vehicle auction
text:
TOLEDO, Ohio (13abc Action News) - The Toledo Police Department is holding its third abandoned and forfeited motor vehicle auction of the year this Saturday at 11am.
The auction is taking place at the Toledo Police Impound Lot on 198 Dura Ave. All vehicles will be sold as is and all sales are final. There will be around 100 cars and trucks on site.
All persons interested in bidding must register at the auctioneer's trailer beginning at 9am. Picture ID is required. Registration is free.
All terms of sale will be cash or check.
Visit the Toledo Police web site at www.toledopolice.com to view a list of all vehicles scheduled for the auction.
